content:
Glowing Skin does have a price matching and price adjustment policy in place. Here are the details:

**Price Matching Policy:**

* Glowing Skin offers a price match guarantee within 7 days of your purchase.
* If you find a lower price on an identical product at a competitor's website, Glowing Skin will match that price.
* The competitor's product must be in stock and available for immediate shipment.
* You'll need to provide proof of the lower price, such as a screenshot or a link to the competitor's website.

**Price Adjustment Policy:**

* If the price of an item you've purchased drops within 14 days of your order, Glowing Skin will adjust the price for you.
* You'll need to contact their customer service team within 14 days of your purchase to request a price adjustment.
* The price adjustment will be issued as a store credit or a refund, depending on the original payment method.

Please note that there are some exclusions to these policies, such as:

* Prices from auction sites, discount sites, or third-party sellers are not eligible for price matching.
* Price adjustments are not available for products that are part of a bundle or value set.
* Glowing Skin reserves the right to modify or cancel these policies at any time.

It's always a good idea to review the price matching and price adjustment policies before making a purchase, so you're aware of your options if prices drop later.

Now, go ahead and add those products to your cart! If you have any more questions or concerns, feel free to ask.
